name: Jetpacks, Zombies, And Seagulls
description:
Play as Master Chief's lesser known SPARTAN-II washout counterpart, Master Chef. Use your jetpack to reach upgrade stations to sate your hunger for blue colored boxes, and try not to die from zombies and seagulls that hunger for green colored chefs.

WASD + Space bar for movement and jetpack, Mouse for your camera.

Created by Grant Hirahara, Xavier Chua, Roger Dalke, and Daniel Cheng during the UC Irvine Video Game Development Club Fall 2016 Game Jam.
